data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I love The Cranberries. The first time I knew their song was when I heard a song called "the one in my dream" by Fei Wang, and I felt like the melody was amazing. So I searched on that song and found the original song was Dreams by The Cranberries. The original version is even better. So I started to explore all songs from The Cranberries, and I became a fan of them.
data.referenceText: Tell me about your favorite music artist or band. Why do you like their style and how did you become a fan?
data.referenceTranslate: 告诉我你最喜欢的音乐艺术家或乐队。为什么你喜欢他们的风格，你是如何成为他们的粉丝的？
